title: Word of the Day Watch Face
summary: Get a new word in a different language every hour, few hours, or day!
description: Get a new word in a different language every hour, few hours, or day!Our watch face brings you much more than the current time of day; it brings you a new word in a different language of your choice!• Customize appearance with different material color schemes• Choose any combination of English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, and Spanish (more languages to come)• Choose between different hourly or daily frequenciesThe journey of a thousand languages begins with the first word!
descriptionHTML:
Get a new word in a different language every hour, few hours, or day!

Our watch face brings you much more than the current time of day; it brings you a new word in a different language of your choice!

• Customize appearance with different material color schemes
• Choose any combination of English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, and Spanish (more languages to come)
• Choose between different hourly or daily frequencies

The journey of a thousand languages begins with the first word!
recentChanges: Articles are now shown for non-English languages
